title.rendered: Why Now is the Perfect Time to Book for 2017

content.rendered:
Fall has arrived in the Rocky Mountains, and winter has proven that it’s not too far off with a few snowfalls already. You may not have planned your winter vacation yet, however, there has never been a better time than now to make your plans for summer 2017.

At AVA Rafting & Zipline, we are already releasing some amazing deals on trips for next summer. Right now, book a rafting + zipline package for 50% off the rafting portion of your trip! This offer applies to rafting + zipline packages on the Arkansas River at our Granite Outpost. Looking for a trip that’s perfect for the entire family? Our Browns Canyon Express + Mountaintop Zipline adventure will send you through Browns Canyon National Monument on class III rapids and on our Granite zipline course through the trees. This trip is perfect for children as young as 7 years old! Need a little more of a challenge? Try our Numbers Half Day + Zipline  package for some class IV action, or head up the river to our class V section on the Pine Creek Half Day + Zipline package. Use promo code 50RAFT17 when you book online, or mention this deal when you car.

Extend your adventure on one of our overnight rafting trips for $50 off per person! This offer is good for overnight rafting trips on the Colorado River at our Kremmling Outpost and the Arkanasas River at our Granite Outpost. Children as young as 5 years old can go on overnight trips on the Colorado River, including the 24 Hours on the Colorado and 3 Day Upper Colorado trips. On the Arkansas River, take your pick between the 24 Hours in Browns Canyon, 2 Day Advanced or 3 Day Mild to Wild trip. Ready to book? CLICK HERE to book an overnight trip on the Colorado River, or CLICK HERE to book an overnight trip on the Arkansas River (discount will automatically apply if you click the links).

If you are looking to take an overnight rafting trip AND go ziplining, then you can save $100 per person on our deluxe overnight trips on the Arkansas River. Choose from the 24 Hours in Browns Canyon Deluxe, 2 Day Advanced Deluxe or, our most exciting trip, the 3 Day Mild to Wild Deluxe.

Need help planning your 2017 summer adventures? Give our trip specialists a call at 877-RAFTING (877-723-8464) for all of our trip planning needs.
